Executive Board

Who does what at Tau Beta Pi?

Contact Us

For general questions, comments, or concerns about Tau Beta Pi, please email tbp@usc.edu.

  • Email

Cathy Ji

President

Preside all Eboard and general membership meetings, be informed of TBP regional and national activities, oversee induction/initiation process.

  • Email

Varun Jain

Vice President

Assumes the role of president in the president's absence, other duties as assigned by president.
